name: JEWISH INSTITUTE FOR NATIONAL SECURITY OF AMERICA
description: 501(c)(3) organization that seeks to promote America's defense and strategic interests.
sampleDescriptions: Promote implementation of recommendations made by a JINSA task force on strengthening security cooperation between the United States and Israel.
